name: MTel No More!
description: This style is inspired because of creating a lot of problems to customers of MTel and in order to be more fast and without annoying and unwanted promos.
additional_info:
The first mobile operator in Bulgaria. Which is the most bold company in Bulgaria. MTel creates a lot of obstacles when a customer wants to finish contract with them. A lot of complains and problems.

Version 0.1 - removed internal ads after login, fast and without annoying and unwanted promos
Version 0.2 - "important info" area removed
Version 0.3 - Complete change according to the new website
Version 0.4 - Remove annoying splash ad and advertised area on every section
